title: Beyond the Sunday Sermon
description: Extended conversations and deeper dives into biblical topics with our pastoral staff and special guests.

title: Biblical Interpretation
description: Teaching series on how to read and understand Scripture in its historical and theological context.

title: Confessional Theology
description: Exploring Reformed theology and doctrine through systematic study of our confessional standards.

title: Membership Seminar
description: Understanding church membership and the Christian life through our comprehensive membership course.

title: The Gospel according to Luke
description: A verse-by-verse study through the Gospel of Luke, exploring the life, ministry, and teachings of Jesus Christ.

title: Smokin' Theologians
description: Engaging discussions with theologians and scholars on important theological topics and biblical interpretation.

title: What We Believe: Knowing and Loving Our Doctrines
description: An exploration of core Christian doctrines, helping believers understand and embrace what we believe and why.

title: The Book of Exodus
description: A study through the Book of Exodus, examining God's deliverance of His people and the establishment of the covenant.

title: Why Do We Worship?
description: Exploring the purpose, meaning, and practice of worship in the Christian life and church community.

title: The Narrow Road to New Life
description: A series on the Christian journey, following Christ on the narrow path that leads to new life in Him.
